mapper.select: select tai.sens_no , tai.district_no , tai.sens_chnl_id , tai."1st_lvl_min" as min1 , tai."1st_lvl_max" as max1 , tai."2nd_lvl_min" as min2 , tai."2nd_lvl_max" as max2 , tai."3rd_lvl_min" as min3 , tai."3rd_lvl_max" as max3 , tai."4th_lvl_min" as min4 , tai."4th_lvl_max" as max4 , tai.lvl_apply_dt from tb_alarm_info tai left join tb_sensor_info tsi on tai.sens_no = tsi.sens_no and tsi.sms_snd_yn ='Y'

select tmd.mgnt_no , tmd.raw_data , tmd.meas_dt , tmd.formul_data from tb_measure_details tmd where tmd.sens_no = #{sens_no} and tmd.sens_chnl_id = #{sens_chnl_id} and tmd.meas_dt between TO_TIMESTAMP(#{meas_dt_start}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff6') and TO_TIMESTAMP(#{meas_dt_end}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss.ff6') and tmd.formul_data >= #{formul_data}::double precision
select tsr.alarm_lvl_nm , tsr.mgnt_no , tsr.district_no , tsr.sms_recv_ph , tsr.sms_chgr_nm , tsr.sms_recv_dept from tb_sms_receiver tsr where tsr.district_no = #{district_no}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_alarm_details (district_no, mgnt_no, sens_no, sens_chnl_id, meas_dt, raw_data, formul_data, alarm_lvl_cd, net_err_yn) values (#{district_no}, #{mgnt_no}, #{sens_no}, #{sens_chnl_id}, #{meas_dt}::timestamp, #{raw_data}::double precision, #{formul_data}::double precision, #{alarm_lvl_cd}, #{net_err_yn})
mapper.select: select district_no , site_no , district_nm , dist_addr , dist_zip , dist_road_addr , dist_type_cd , dist_abbr , dist_pic , dist_view_pic , dist_lon , dist_lat , dist_zoom , inst_comp_id1 , meas_comp_id1 , inst_comp_id2 , meas_comp_id2 , meas_str_ymd , meas_end_ymd , dist_offi_nm from tb_district_info where district_no = #{district_no}
select tsi.sens_no, tsi.sens_nm, tsi.senstype_no, tst.sens_tp_nm from tb_sensor_info tsi left join tb_sensor_type tst on tsi.senstype_no = tst.senstype_no where sens_no = #{sens_no}
